# Example module list for building/running on Magic Castle / Alliance clusters.
# Replace these with exact module names/versions available on your site.
gcc/XX.Y
openmpi/XX.Y
cuda/YY.Z
python/3.X
matplotlib/3.X  # if matplotlib is packaged as its own module
flask/optional-or-use-pip  # lightweight frontend server for local plots
pandas/optional-or-use-pip # convenient CSV handling if available
likwid/optional-or-perf-tools  # profiling support if available
